title: Fix Notification and VPN service, Add Copy log feature

body:
Implemented a 'Copy Log' button to streamline community debugging and support efforts. This feature enables users to share logs for troubleshooting purposes easily. Additionally, addressed an issue where notifications were disappearing prematurely, enhancing the overall user experience. Furthermore, improved the performance and stability of the VPN Service to ensure reliable operation.

### Changes:
- Added 'Copy Log' button for easy log sharing.
- Fixed notification disappearance issue.
- Enhanced overall performance.
- Improved VPN Service stability.
